title: Cannot access corporate email from home
description: User reports that Outlook cannot connect to the corporate mailbox from home network.
resolution: Explained that VPN connection is required from outside the office. Asked the user to connect to VPN and restart Outlook. After VPN connection was established, email started working.

title: VPN client shows authentication failed
description: User cannot log in to VPN. Error 'Authentication failed' is displayed.
resolution: Checked the user account in Active Directory and found it locked. Unlocked the account and asked the user to try again. VPN connection was established successfully.

title: Laptop cannot connect to CORP-WIFI in meeting room
description: User can see CORP-WIFI but cannot connect in a specific meeting room.
resolution: Asked the user to move closer to another access point and try again. Also updated the Wi-Fi driver on the laptop. Connection to CORP-WIFI was successful after driver update.

title: User cannot print to network printer PRN-01
description: Print jobs stay in queue on PRN-01 and do not print.
resolution: Restarted the print spooler service on the print server and cleared the stuck job. After that new print jobs were processed normally. Advised the user to try printing again.
